title: Kate Bush Mourns Missing Friend After Christmas Day Incident
summary: Singer Kate Bush expressed deep sorrow after her close friend Matthew Upham, a local antiques dealer, went missing during a Christmas Day swim in Budleigh Salterton, Devon. The two had been friends for three decades, and Bush described Upham as a very dear friend who was kind, thoughtful, and lived life fully. Emergency services, including the coastguard, were called after two men in their 40s and 60s could not be located, but the search was called off later that day. In a tribute on her official website, Bush highlighted Upham's strength as a swimmer and his love for kayaking, emphasizing the tragedy of his loss. She and Upham's family are heartbroken, with the family issuing a statement on Instagram to thank the emergency services for their efforts. This article covers the emotional impact of the incident, the response from authorities, and the personal reflections shared by Bush and the family.
